text: The vision [strongs id="h2377" /] of Isaiah [strongs id="h3470" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Amoz [strongs id="h0531" /], which he saw [strongs id="h2372" tvm="8804" /] concerning Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] and Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /] in the days [strongs id="h3117" /] of Uzziah [strongs id="h5818" /], Jotham [strongs id="h3147" /], Ahaz [strongs id="h0271" /], [and] Hezekiah [strongs id="h3169" /], kings [strongs id="h4428" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /].

Hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8798" /], O heavens [strongs id="h8064" /], and give ear [strongs id="h0238" tvm="8685" /], O earth [strongs id="h0776" /]: for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath spoken [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /], I have nourished [strongs id="h1431" tvm="8765" /] and brought up [strongs id="h7311" tvm="8790" /] children [strongs id="h1121" /], and they have rebelled [strongs id="h6586" tvm="8804" /] against me.

The ox [strongs id="h7794" /] knoweth [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] his owner [strongs id="h7069" tvm="8802" /], and the ass [strongs id="h2543" /] his master’s [strongs id="h1167" /] crib [strongs id="h0018" /]: [but] Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] doth not know [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /], my people [strongs id="h5971" /] doth not consider [strongs id="h0995" tvm="8712" /].

Ah [strongs id="h1945" /] sinful [strongs id="h2398" tvm="8802" /] nation [strongs id="h1471" /], a people [strongs id="h5971" /] laden [strongs id="h3515" /] with iniquity [strongs id="h5771" /], a seed [strongs id="h2233" /] of evildoers [strongs id="h7489" tvm="8688" /], children [strongs id="h1121" /] that are corrupters [strongs id="h7843" tvm="8688" /]: they have forsaken [strongs id="h5800" tvm="8804" /] [strongs id="h0853" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], they have provoked [strongs id="h5006" /] [strongs id="h0853" /] the Holy One [strongs id="h6918" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] unto anger [strongs id="h5006" tvm="8765" /], they are gone away [strongs id="h2114" tvm="8738" /] backward [strongs id="h0268" /].

Why should ye be stricken [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8714" /] any more? ye will revolt [strongs id="h5627" /] more and more [strongs id="h3254" tvm="8686" /]: the whole head [strongs id="h7218" /] is sick [strongs id="h2483" /], and the whole heart [strongs id="h3824" /] faint [strongs id="h1742" /].

From the sole [strongs id="h3709" /] of the foot [strongs id="h7272" /] even unto the head [strongs id="h7218" /] [there is] no soundness [strongs id="h4974" /] in it; [but] wounds [strongs id="h6482" /], and bruises [strongs id="h2250" /], and putrifying [strongs id="h2961" /] sores [strongs id="h4347" /]: they have not been closed [strongs id="h2115" tvm="8804" /], neither bound up [strongs id="h2280" tvm="8795" /], neither mollified [strongs id="h7401" tvm="8795" /] with ointment [strongs id="h8081" /].

Your country [strongs id="h0776" /] [is] desolate [strongs id="h8077" /], your cities [strongs id="h5892" /] [are] burned [strongs id="h8313" tvm="8803" /] with fire [strongs id="h0784" /]: your land [strongs id="h0127" /], strangers [strongs id="h2114" tvm="8801" /] devour [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8802" /] it in your presence, and [it is] desolate [strongs id="h8077" /], as overthrown [strongs id="h4114" /] by strangers [strongs id="h2114" tvm="8801" /].

And the daughter [strongs id="h1323" /] of Zion [strongs id="h6726" /] is left [strongs id="h3498" tvm="8738" /] as a cottage [strongs id="h5521" /] in a vineyard [strongs id="h3754" /], as a lodge [strongs id="h4412" /] in a garden of cucumbers [strongs id="h4750" /], as a besieged [strongs id="h5341" tvm="8803" /] city [strongs id="h5892" /].

Except [strongs id="h3884" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /] had left [strongs id="h3498" tvm="8689" /] unto us a very small [strongs id="h4592" /] remnant [strongs id="h8300" /], we should have been [strongs id="h1961" tvm="8804" /] as Sodom [strongs id="h5467" /], [and] we should have been like [strongs id="h1819" tvm="8804" /] unto Gomorrah [strongs id="h6017" /].

Hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8798" /] the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], ye rulers [strongs id="h7101" /] of Sodom [strongs id="h5467" /]; give ear [strongs id="h0238" tvm="8685" /] unto the law [strongs id="h8451" /] of our God [strongs id="h0430" /], ye people [strongs id="h5971" /] of Gomorrah [strongs id="h6017" /].

To what [strongs id="h4100" /] purpose [is] the multitude [strongs id="h7230" /] of your sacrifices [strongs id="h2077" /] unto me? saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]: I am full [strongs id="h7646" tvm="8804" /] of the burnt offerings [strongs id="h5930" /] of rams [strongs id="h0352" /], and the fat [strongs id="h2459" /] of fed beasts [strongs id="h4806" /]; and I delight [strongs id="h2654" tvm="8804" /] not in the blood [strongs id="h1818" /] of bullocks [strongs id="h6499" /], or of lambs [strongs id="h3532" /], or of he goats [strongs id="h6260" /].

When ye come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] to appear [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8736" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] me, who hath required [strongs id="h1245" tvm="8765" /] this at your hand [strongs id="h3027" /], to tread [strongs id="h7429" tvm="8800" /] my courts [strongs id="h2691" /]?

Bring [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8687" /] no more [strongs id="h3254" tvm="8686" /] vain [strongs id="h7723" /] oblations [strongs id="h4503" /]; incense [strongs id="h7004" /] is an abomination [strongs id="h8441" /] unto me; the new moons [strongs id="h2320" /] and sabbaths [strongs id="h7676" /], the calling [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8800" /] of assemblies [strongs id="h4744" /], I cannot away with [strongs id="h3201" tvm="8799" /]; [it is] iniquity [strongs id="h0205" /], even the solemn meeting [strongs id="h6116" /].

Your new moons [strongs id="h2320" /] and your appointed feasts [strongs id="h4150" /] my soul [strongs id="h5315" /] hateth [strongs id="h8130" tvm="8804" /]: they are a trouble [strongs id="h2960" /] unto me; I am weary [strongs id="h3811" tvm="8738" /] to bear [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8800" /] [them].

And when ye spread forth [strongs id="h6566" tvm="8763" /] your hands [strongs id="h3709" /], I will hide [strongs id="h5956" tvm="8686" /] mine eyes [strongs id="h5869" /] from you: yea, when ye make many [strongs id="h7235" tvm="8686" /] prayers [strongs id="h8605" /], I will not hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8802" /]: your hands [strongs id="h3027" /] are full [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8804" /] of blood [strongs id="h1818" /].

Wash [strongs id="h7364" tvm="8798" /] you, make you clean [strongs id="h2135" tvm="8690" /]; put away [strongs id="h5493" tvm="8685" /] the evil [strongs id="h7455" /] of your doings [strongs id="h4611" /] from before [strongs id="h5048" /] mine eyes [strongs id="h5869" /]; cease [strongs id="h2308" tvm="8798" /] to do evil [strongs id="h7489" tvm="8687" /];

Learn [strongs id="h3925" tvm="8798" /] to do well [strongs id="h3190" tvm="8687" /]; seek [strongs id="h1875" tvm="8798" /] judgment [strongs id="h4941" /], relieve [strongs id="h0833" tvm="8761" /] the oppressed [strongs id="h2541" /], judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8798" /] the fatherless [strongs id="h3490" /], plead [strongs id="h7378" tvm="8798" /] for the widow [strongs id="h0490" /].

Come now [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /], and let us reason together [strongs id="h3198" tvm="8735" /], saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]: though your sins [strongs id="h2399" /] be as scarlet [strongs id="h8144" /], they shall be as white [strongs id="h3835" tvm="8686" /] as snow [strongs id="h7950" /]; though they be red [strongs id="h0119" tvm="8686" /] like crimson [strongs id="h8438" /], they shall be as wool [strongs id="h6785" /].

If ye be willing [strongs id="h0014" tvm="8799" /] and obedient [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /], ye shall eat [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8799" /] the good [strongs id="h2898" /] of the land [strongs id="h0776" /]:

But if ye refuse [strongs id="h3985" tvm="8762" /] and rebel [strongs id="h4784" tvm="8804" /], ye shall be devoured [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8792" /] with the sword [strongs id="h2719" /]: for the mouth [strongs id="h6310" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath spoken [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] [it].

How is the faithful [strongs id="h0539" tvm="8737" /] city [strongs id="h7151" /] become an harlot [strongs id="h2181" tvm="8802" /]! it was full [strongs id="h4392" /] of judgment [strongs id="h4941" /]; righteousness [strongs id="h6664" /] lodged [strongs id="h3885" tvm="8799" /] in it; but now murderers [strongs id="h7523" tvm="8764" /].
Thy silver [strongs id="h3701" /] is become dross [strongs id="h5509" /], thy wine [strongs id="h5435" /] mixed [strongs id="h4107" tvm="8803" /] with water [strongs id="h4325" /]:

Thy princes [strongs id="h8269" /] [are] rebellious [strongs id="h5637" tvm="8802" /], and companions [strongs id="h2270" /] of thieves [strongs id="h1590" /]: every one loveth [strongs id="h0157" tvm="8802" /] gifts [strongs id="h7810" /], and followeth [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8802" /] after rewards [strongs id="h8021" /]: they judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8799" /] not the fatherless [strongs id="h3490" /], neither doth the cause [strongs id="h7379" /] of the widow [strongs id="h0490" /] come [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] unto them.

Therefore saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the Lord [strongs id="h0113" /], the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], the mighty One [strongs id="h0046" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], Ah [strongs id="h1945" /], I will ease [strongs id="h5162" tvm="8735" /] me of mine adversaries [strongs id="h6862" /], and avenge [strongs id="h5358" tvm="8735" /] me of mine enemies [strongs id="h0341" tvm="8802" /]:

And I will turn [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] my hand [strongs id="h3027" /] upon thee, and purely [strongs id="h1253" /] purge away [strongs id="h6884" tvm="8799" /] thy dross [strongs id="h5509" /], and take away [strongs id="h5493" tvm="8686" /] all thy tin [strongs id="h0913" /]:

And I will restore [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] thy judges [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8802" /] as at the first [strongs id="h7223" /], and thy counsellors [strongs id="h3289" tvm="8802" /] as at the beginning [strongs id="h8462" /]: afterward [strongs id="h0310" /] thou shalt be called [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8735" /], The city [strongs id="h5892" /] of righteousness [strongs id="h6664" /], the faithful [strongs id="h0539" tvm="8737" /] city [strongs id="h7151" /].

Zion [strongs id="h6726" /] shall be redeemed [strongs id="h6299" tvm="8735" /] with judgment [strongs id="h4941" /], and her converts [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8802" /] with righteousness [strongs id="h6666" /].

And the destruction [strongs id="h7667" /] of the transgressors [strongs id="h6586" tvm="8802" /] and of the sinners [strongs id="h2400" /] [shall be] together [strongs id="h3162" /], and they that forsake [strongs id="h5800" tvm="8802" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] shall be consumed [strongs id="h3615" tvm="8799" /].

For they shall be ashamed [strongs id="h0954" tvm="8799" /] of the oaks [strongs id="h0352" /] which ye have desired [strongs id="h2530" tvm="8804" /], and ye shall be confounded [strongs id="h2659" tvm="8799" /] for the gardens [strongs id="h1593" /] that ye have chosen [strongs id="h0977" tvm="8804" /].

For ye shall be as an oak [strongs id="h0424" /] whose leaf [strongs id="h5929" /] fadeth [strongs id="h5034" tvm="8802" /], and as a garden [strongs id="h1593" /] that hath no water [strongs id="h4325" /].

And the strong [strongs id="h2634" /] shall be as tow [strongs id="h5296" /], and the maker [strongs id="h6467" /] of it as a spark [strongs id="h5213" /], and they shall both [strongs id="h8147" /] burn [strongs id="h1197" tvm="8804" /] together [strongs id="h3162" /], and none shall quench [strongs id="h3518" tvm="8764" /] [them].

The word [strongs id="h1697" /] that Isaiah [strongs id="h3470" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Amoz [strongs id="h0531" /] saw [strongs id="h2372" tvm="8804" /] concerning Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] and Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /].

And it shall come to pass in the last [strongs id="h0319" /] days [strongs id="h3117" /], [that] the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /] of the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] house [strongs id="h1004" /] shall be established [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8737" /] in the top [strongs id="h7218" /] of the mountains [strongs id="h2022" /], and shall be exalted [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8737" /] above the hills [strongs id="h1389" /]; and all nations [strongs id="h1471" /] shall flow [strongs id="h5102" tvm="8804" /] unto it.

And many [strongs id="h7227" /] people [strongs id="h5971" /] shall go [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] and say [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /], Come [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /] ye, and let us go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] to the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], to the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of the God [strongs id="h0430" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /]; and he will teach [strongs id="h3384" tvm="8686" /] us of his ways [strongs id="h1870" /], and we will walk [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] in his paths [strongs id="h0734" /]: for out of Zion [strongs id="h6726" /] shall go forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] the law [strongs id="h8451" /], and the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] from Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /].

And he shall judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8804" /] among the nations [strongs id="h1471" /], and shall rebuke [strongs id="h3198" tvm="8689" /] many [strongs id="h7227" /] people [strongs id="h5971" /]: and they shall beat [strongs id="h3807" tvm="8765" /] their swords [strongs id="h2719" /] into plowshares [strongs id="h0855" /], and their spears [strongs id="h2595" /] into pruninghooks [strongs id="h4211" /]: nation [strongs id="h1471" /] shall not lift up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] sword [strongs id="h2719" /] against nation [strongs id="h1471" /], neither shall they learn [strongs id="h3925" tvm="8799" /] war [strongs id="h4421" /] any more.

O house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], come [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8798" /] ye, and let us walk [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] in the light [strongs id="h0216" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

Therefore thou hast forsaken [strongs id="h5203" tvm="8804" /] thy people [strongs id="h5971" /] the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], because they be replenished [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8804" /] from the east [strongs id="h6924" /], and [are] soothsayers [strongs id="h6049" tvm="8781" /] like the Philistines [strongs id="h6430" /], and they please [strongs id="h5606" tvm="8686" /] themselves in the children [strongs id="h3206" /] of strangers [strongs id="h5237" /].

Their land [strongs id="h0776" /] also is full [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8735" /] of silver [strongs id="h3701" /] and gold [strongs id="h2091" /], neither [is there any] end [strongs id="h7097" /] of their treasures [strongs id="h0214" /]; their land [strongs id="h0776" /] is also full [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8735" /] of horses [strongs id="h5483" /], neither [is there any] end [strongs id="h7097" /] of their chariots [strongs id="h4818" /]:

Their land [strongs id="h0776" /] also is full [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8735" /] of idols [strongs id="h0457" /]; they worship [strongs id="h7812" tvm="8691" /] the work [strongs id="h4639" /] of their own hands [strongs id="h3027" /], that which their own fingers [strongs id="h0676" /] have made [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /]:

And the mean man [strongs id="h0120" /] boweth down [strongs id="h7817" tvm="8735" /], and the great man [strongs id="h0376" /] humbleth [strongs id="h8213" tvm="8799" /] himself: therefore forgive [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] them not.

Enter [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8798" /] into the rock [strongs id="h6697" /], and hide [strongs id="h2934" tvm="8734" /] thee in the dust [strongs id="h6083" /], for [strongs id="h6440" /] fear [strongs id="h6343" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and for the glory [strongs id="h1926" /] of his majesty [strongs id="h1347" /].

The lofty [strongs id="h1365" /] looks [strongs id="h5869" /] of man [strongs id="h0120" /] shall be humbled [strongs id="h8213" tvm="8804" /], and the haughtiness [strongs id="h7312" /] of men [strongs id="h0582" /] shall be bowed down [strongs id="h7817" tvm="8804" /], and the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] alone shall be exalted [strongs id="h7682" tvm="8738" /] in that day [strongs id="h3117" /].

For the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /] [shall be] upon every [one that is] proud [strongs id="h1343" /] and lofty [strongs id="h7311" tvm="8802" /], and upon every [one that is] lifted up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8737" /]; and he shall be brought low [strongs id="h8213" tvm="8804" /]:

And upon all the cedars [strongs id="h0730" /] of Lebanon [strongs id="h3844" /], [that are] high [strongs id="h7311" tvm="8802" /] and lifted up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8737" /], and upon all the oaks [strongs id="h0437" /] of Bashan [strongs id="h1316" /],
And upon all the high [strongs id="h7311" tvm="8802" /] mountains [strongs id="h2022" /], and upon all the hills [strongs id="h1389" /] [that are] lifted up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8737" /],
And upon every high [strongs id="h1364" /] tower [strongs id="h4026" /], and upon every fenced [strongs id="h1219" tvm="8803" /] wall [strongs id="h2346" /],
And upon all the ships [strongs id="h0591" /] of Tarshish [strongs id="h8659" /], and upon all pleasant [strongs id="h2532" /] pictures [strongs id="h7914" /].

And the loftiness [strongs id="h1365" /] of man [strongs id="h0120" /] shall be bowed down [strongs id="h7817" tvm="8804" /], and the haughtiness [strongs id="h7312" /] of men [strongs id="h0582" /] shall be made low [strongs id="h8213" tvm="8804" /]: and the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] alone shall be exalted [strongs id="h7682" tvm="8738" /] in that day [strongs id="h3117" /].
And the idols [strongs id="h0457" /] he shall utterly [strongs id="h3632" /] abolish [strongs id="h2498" tvm="8799" /].

And they shall go [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8804" /] into the holes [strongs id="h4631" /] of the rocks [strongs id="h6697" /], and into the caves [strongs id="h4247" /] of the earth [strongs id="h6083" /], for [strongs id="h6440" /] fear [strongs id="h6343" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and for the glory [strongs id="h1926" /] of his majesty [strongs id="h1347" /], when he ariseth [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8800" /] to shake terribly [strongs id="h6206" tvm="8800" /] the earth [strongs id="h0776" /].

In that day [strongs id="h3117" /] a man [strongs id="h0120" /] shall cast [strongs id="h7993" tvm="8686" /] his idols [strongs id="h0457" /] of silver [strongs id="h3701" /], and his idols [strongs id="h0457" /] of gold [strongs id="h2091" /], which they made [each one] for himself [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] to worship [strongs id="h7812" tvm="8692" /], to the moles [strongs id="h2661" /] [strongs id="h6512" /] and to the bats [strongs id="h5847" /];
